Articles.Content: Hello all, I'm having spaceplane troubles. I can never seem to make one that doesnt tip over. should i put the CoM near or far from the CoL? Thanks,
CoL should be a reasonable distance behind the centre of mass, but if it's too far, the plane is too stable to turn easily.
alright, thanks, I'll go try that

No problem

If you have problems controlling it, either add more control surfaces, or move the centre of lift closer to the centre of mass.... or both xD
